name: Filter.Tendsto.partialSups
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
instâœÂ² : SemilatticeSup L

hf : âˆ€ (k : Nat), LE.le k n â†’ Filter.Tendsto (f k) l (nhds (g k))
âŠ¢ Filter.Tendsto ((partialSups f) n) l (nhds ((partialSups g) n))
decl:
protected lemma partialSups (hf : âˆ€ k â‰¤ n, Tendsto (f k) l (ğ“ (g k))) :
    Tendsto (partialSups f n) l (ğ“ (partialSups g n)) := by
  simp only [partialSups_eq_sup'_range]
  refine finset_sup'_nhds _ ?_
  simpa [Nat.lt_succ_iff]
